analyzed: ga na tsakra bi dhi

original: bsod nams ye shes tshogs yin te //
analyzed: bsod nams ye shes tshogs yin te

analyzed: tshogs la dngos grub mchog thob gyur

original: de phyir de yi cho ga ni //
analyzed: de phyir de yi cho ga ni

analyzed: brgyad dang chu bzhi chos lnga dang tshes chu la ni de rab mchod

original: dur khrod dam ni shing gcig mchog / skyed mos tshal dang kun dga' dang // de bzhin rang gi khyim dang ni //
analyzed: dur khrod dam ni shing gcig mchog skyed mos tshal dang kun dga dang de bzhin rang gi khyim dang ni

original: gzhan yang dben pa'i khyim du bya //
analyzed: gzhan yang dben ba khyim du byed

original: dang po tshogs kyi yo byad bsags te /
analyzed: dang po tshogs kyi yo byad bsags te

original: me tog tshogs kyi slob dpon dang / rnal 'byor yon phul nas gsol ba gdab /
analyzed: me tog tshogs kyi slob dpon dang rnal byor yon bul nas gsol ba gdab

original: de nas tshogs kyi slob dpon gyis //
analyzed: de nas tshogs kyi slob dpon gyis

analyzed: aom ma ha ra shuddhe sarba dharma ha ra shuddhoo& ham

analyzed: zhes ba sngags mang ba bzlas

analyzed: de nas bdud rtsi sbyong ba byed

original: aom aa mri ta h'um ci nus bzlas /
analyzed: aom aa mri ta hum ci nus bzlas

original: rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas /

analyzed: srung ba khor lo byed

original: de nas bskyed rim bsgom ste /
